item.title: 25 Apr 2025 21:30
item.description: After a good run with wireguard over the last four years, I switched over the devices on my home network to Tailscale today to lean-in on its mesh abilities. Technically I could have modified my wireguard setup to be a mesh network. But I just didn’t have the patience to tweak each configuration file! ðŸ”—
item.content:encoded: After a good run with wireguard over the last four years, I switched over the devices on my home network to Tailscale today to lean-in on its mesh abilities. Technically I could have modified my wireguard setup to be a mesh network. But I just didn’t have the patience to tweak each configuration file! ðŸ”—
